channel.title: Im back nerd ragging on [317]
channel.description: hi ppl so can anyone show me were the camera is in the 317 client? i know that it should be in key listener method but all i see is variables leading to arrays that goto client.java that go in a for loop that does nothing so can anyone shine some light thanks :confused:

item.title: Im back nerd ragging on [317]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I think he may be talking about the perspective that you see your person as? You know, 1st person shooters. I’m not sure if that’s an easy fix as in going into one of your client classes and changing a method.

Read full topic
